paragraph.value: We report metric results when grouping crowd workers into 5 bins using the full range of ADR of the dataset. The ADR-based bias measures (Tab. 2) follow the expected trend (model 1 appears more biased than models 2 and 3) contrary to the protected attributes-based measures. Model 1 trained with MV labels exhibits similar performance across demographic groups  Model 2's performance is different across groups
